thread.title: Marco Silva’s first game in charge of Hull City was met by fans protesting against chairman Assem Allam before their match with Swansea City
thread.title_full: Marco Silva’s first game in charge of Hull City was met by fans protesting against chairman Assem Allam before their match with Swansea City

author: sunsportonline
title: Marco Silva’s first game in charge of Hull City was met by fans protesting against chairman Assem Allam before their match with Swansea City
text:
EFL Tigers roar Marco Silva’s first game in charge of Hull City was met by fans protesting against chairman Assem Allam before their match with Swansea City 
Supporters came together as once again let their opinions know they want Allam out before their FA Cup third round clash by jake lambourne
